original_text:
**INSTITUTION
CRITICAL CARE MEDICINE
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN PROGRESS NOTE
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING **NAME[UUU : RRR]
**NAME[TTT SSS]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Nov 19 2007]
EVALUATION DATE :
**DATE[Nov 23 07]
I am managing this critically ill , **AGE[in 40s]- year - old male who is postoperative day #4 from repair of SMA pseudoaneurysm .
Postoperative course complicated by fluid overload , respiratory insufficiency and jaundice .
I am seeing him for management of these issues .
I have seen and examined the patient , reviewed his laboratory , radiographic , and EMTEK data , and discussed the management with the General and Vascular surgeons .
PROBLEMS AND MANAGEMENT ARE AS FOLLOWS :
1. Respiratory failure .
Chest x-ray shows increasing pulmonary vascular congestion and infiltrates .
On the vent , I have him on assist control .
His peak airway pressures , minute ventilation and gas exchange have been adequate .
I did place him on a pressure support trial today and after a two-hour trial , his rapid shallow breathing index was less than 100 .
I have weaned and extubated him .
I have also given him a couple doses of Lasix today which he has responded with a brisk diuresis .
Clinically he is improving with the diuresis and will continue to diurese him over the course of the evening .
2. Status post SMA aneurysm repair .
He remains on prophylactic antibiotics .
I have increased his dose of labetalol for better blood pressure and heart rate control and he seems to be responding nicely to that .
His abdominal distention has improved significantly as has his tenderness .
I will start some trickle tube feeds with Peptinex today .
Of note , his total bilirubin is up to 10 today .
His transaminases are unremarkable .
Previously , his bilirubin was around 5 to 6 .
I suspect that he just has some increasing cholestasis after the surgery .
We have ordered a right upper quadrant ultrasound to evaluate .
Total Critical Care time = 40 minutes .
___________________________________
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
Dictator :
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
SRG/maf
D :
**DATE[Nov 23 2007] 22:08:46
T :
**DATE[Nov 23 2007] 22:38:02
R :
**DATE[Nov 23 2007] 22:38:02/maf
Job ID :

-**NAME[XXX , QQQ M]. ***
Electronically Signed by **NAME[WWW XXX]
**DATE[Jan 19 2008] 02:55:04 PM
